name: One day trip from Bangalore to Keshava Temple, Somnathpura, Karnataka.
description: This trip is about travelling to an ancient ruin of the Hoysala dynasty built in 1291 A.D. This trip gave me chance to see some beautiful Indian architecture from 1200, and some great country side view of rural India. I covered a beautiful lake on the way at Malavalli Village, which is a paradise for bird photographers and finally a visit to the famous wooden toy stores, home decors of Channapatna town of Karnataka. The artifacts here are known for their handcrafted artistic touch, rich Indian colors and a display of our cultural old ways.All this on my bike in one day travelling around 300 km to and back from Bangalore
